com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl

Class DataServiceImpl<T extends Model<E>,E extends java.lang.Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl.DataServiceImpl<T,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - entity type, extends Model.
    E - entity id type, extends Number.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataService<T,E>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContentServiceImpl, MediaServiceImpl, MessageServiceImpl, ResponseServiceImpl, UserServiceImpl

    public abstract class DataServiceImpl<T extends Model<E>,E extends java.lang.Number>
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataService<T,E>
    The class of the service layer, describes a set of methods for working with objects of Model class or subclasses.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yurii.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Model, DataService, ContentServiceImpl, MediaServiceImpl, ArticleServiceImpl, CategoryServiceImpl, CompanyServiceImpl, PhotoServiceImpl, ResponseServiceImpl, SectionServiceImpl, UserServiceImpl, VideoServiceImpl, DataDao
